document_data.name: Yarash
document_data.mainbody: '''Yarash''' was a wizard living near [[Phlan]] in [[1340 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Yarash was a wizard and alchemist who busied himself with creating new species in his pyramid near Phlan in order to dominate the [[Moonsea]]. He created many mutants that lived in rooms of the pyramid.
document_data.History: Yarash was busy for 30 years in trying to create a race of freshwater [[sahuagin]], despite never seeing a true sahuagin in his life. At last, in 1340 DR, an adventuring party killed him.
